textBeforeTable: USER_INDEXTYPE_ARRAYTYPES displays information about the array types specified by the indextypes owned by the current user. DBA_INDEXTYPE_ARRAYTYPES displays information about the array types specified by all indextypes in the database. Related Views ALL_INDEXTYPE_ARRAYTYPES displays information about the array types specified by the indextypes accessible to the current user. ALL_INDEXTYPE_ARRAYTYPES 390/2169 Skip Headers-->
